bg

msg
Sister, the clean-up work of the frontier is almost finished. Some skirmishers continue to assault the base, but they are not a threat to us.
姐姐大人~前线的清理工作已经进入尾声了，不过仍然有不少散兵游勇还在不断骚扰基地周边，但是已经构不成威胁了~
お姉ちゃん、前線の片付けがもうじき終わるよ。でも、敵の残存数はかなりのものみたい。基地の周辺でも騒ぎ続けてるし。ただ、脅威レベルそのものは下がったかな！
언니, 전선 정리가 곧 끝날 거야. 하지만 적의 잔존 수는 상당한 것 같아. 기지 주변에서도 계속 소동이 벌어지고 있지만. 그래도 위협 레벨 자체는 내려간 것 같아!
Bronya, we've almost finished clearing the frontlines. But it looks like there's a lot of enemies left. They're still making noise around the base. But at least the threat level itself has gone down!
Sister-sama ~ the front line cleanup work has entered the end, but there are still a lot of stragglers still harassing the perimeter of the base, but no longer constitute a threat ~
Sis, we're almost done clearing the front line. But it looks like there are quite a few of them left. They're still making noise around the base. But the threat level itself has gone down!

Although our defended the attack this time, I believe it's just a beginning. We have to be on alert.

Although we were able to defend against the onslaught this time, I believe this is just the beginning. We need to be on alert.

We were able to prevent this attack, but I feel this is just the beginning. So we must be more careful.
msg
Based one he last few attacks from the Houkai creatures, they have become more frequent. If I'm right, there'll be a big move coming.
从最近几次崩坏生物的袭击频率来看，它们的活动越来越频繁了。如果不是偶然的话，之后一定会有大动作。
ここ最近の崩壊生物の襲撃頻度からして、彼らの活動はますます盛んになっています。もし偶然でなければ、きっともうすぐ大きな動きがあるでしょう。
최근 붕괴 생물의 습격 빈도로 보아 그들의 활동은 점점 더 활발해지고 있습니다. 만약 우연이 아니라면, 아마도 곧 큰 움직임이 있을 겁니다.
Judging from the frequency of the Honkai Beast attacks recently, their activity seems to be getting more and more intense. If this is not a coincidence, something big is definitely coming soon.
Judging from the frequency of the last few attacks by the collapsing creatures, they are becoming more and more active. If it's not a coincidence, there must be a big move after that.
Judging by the frequency of recent attacks by decaying organisms, they are becoming more and more active. If it is not a coincidence, there will surely be a major movement soon.
speaker
portraits
msg
What can this batch of monsters do if they can't even think? The world has been trapped in absolute silence after the calamity, there should be no target for the monsters.
那群连思考都做不到的怪物能够做什么呢？大崩坏之后世界已经陷入死寂，它们已经没有要毁灭的目标了吧？
あんな思考すらできない怪物たちに何ができるの？大崩壊後の世界は死に滅んでしまったんだから、もう滅ぼす目標もないよね？
저런 사고조차 할 수 없는 괴물들이 뭘 할 수 있다는 거야? 대붕괴 이후의 세계는 이미 죽어버렸는데, 이제 파괴할 목표도 없잖아?

What can a bunch of monsters that can't even think do? This world has been trapped in dead silence ever since the Eruption, and there's nothing left for them to destroy, right? (TN: "Great Honkais" are Honkai Erupthons.)
What can the monsters who can't even think do? The world has fallen into dead silence after the Great Collapse, and they have no more targets to destroy, right?
What can be done with those monsters who can't even think? The world has been destroyed by death after the Great Collapse, so there is no goal to destroy it anymore, right?
speaker
portraits
msg
They may be targeting us... No one ever knows what the Houkai want, but if they desire to wipe out human beings, that means our existence is standing in their way.
不是还有我们在么…崩坏的目的从来都是一个未解之谜，但是如果它的目标是将人类全部毁灭的话，那我们的存在就是它继续杀戮的动力。
いえ、まだブローニャたちレジスタンスがいます。崩壊の目的はずっと謎のままですが、もしその目的が全人類の絶滅だとすれば、私たちの存在が殺戮を続ける原動力になります。
아니, 아직 브로냐님들의 레지스탕스가 있습니다. 붕괴의 목적은 계속 미스터리로 남아있지만, 만약 그 목적이 전 인류의 절멸이라면 우리의 존재가 살육을 계속하는 원동력이 될 거예요.
No, our Resistance still exists.  The ultimate goal of the Honkai remains a mystery, but if it's the extinction of humanity, our existence will be the driving force behind the continued slaughter.
We are still here... The purpose of the collapse has never been an unsolved mystery, but if its goal is to destroy all of humanity, then our existence is the impetus for it to continue killing.

No, there is still Bronya and the rest of the resistance. The purpose of the collapse has always remained a mystery, but if that purpose is the extermination of the entire human race, our presence will be the driving force behind the continued slaughter.

If there's no problem, please start your training. Seele, I'll leave it to you. I'm still a bit concerned about the Houkai creatures, so I'll be digging into them and leave the base to you.
既然身体没问题了就开始训练吧。希儿，接下来交给你了。关于崩坏生物的状况我还是有点在意，准备深入调查一下，基地这边就拜托你了。
身体に問題がないのであれば訓練を始めましょう。ゼーレ、あとは任せました。崩壊生物の状況についてはもう少し注意を続けます。もっと踏み込んで調べなければいけないようです。基地のことはお願いします。
신체에 문제가 없다면 훈련을 시작합시다. 제레, 이후는 맡겼습니다. 붕괴 생물의 상황에 대해서는 좀 더 주의를 기울일게요. 더 깊이 조사해야 할 것 같습니다. 기지의 일은 부탁드립니다.

If there are no physical problems, you should begin your training. Seele, I'll leave the rest to you. I'll still be keeping a close eye on the situation with the Honkai Beasts. It seems it needs to be investigated further. I'm counting on you to take care of the base.

Now that your body is okay, let's start training. Hier, I'll leave the rest to you. I am still a little concerned about the situation of the collapsed creatures, and I am going to investigate it in depth, so I am counting on you for the base.

If there are no physical problems, then let's start training. Seele, I've left the rest to you. I will continue to pay a little more attention to the situation with the decaying organisms. It seems that we need to investigate more in-depth. Please take care of the base.

msg
Alright, stop holding it against her. It's true that she has a stern face, but she has a soft spot for us.
好啦，你也不要对姐姐大人有什么不满啦，虽然平时总是严肃的样子，但是她可是出了名的刀子嘴豆腐心。
あなたもお姉ちゃんに文句は言わないでね。いつもは厳しいけれど、内心はとても優しくて有名なんだから。
너도 언니에게 불만은 말하지 말아줘. 항상 엄격하지만 속마음은 매우 상냥해서 유명하니까.

You don't have to hold it against her. She may act serious, but she's notorious for being a wolf with a heart of gold. (TN: Chinese metaphor says "knife mouthed with a heart of tofu" so I tried my best)
Well, you also do not have any dissatisfaction with the elder sister, although usually always serious look, but she is known as the knife mouth tofu heart.
Don't complain to your sister either. She is always strict, but inside she is very kind and famous.
